title: Fed minutes point to ‘likely’ rate cut coming in September
content: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released minutes from its July 30-31 policy meeting.

title: U.S. job growth revised down by the most since 2009. Why this time is different
content: There's a lot of debate about how much signal to take from the 818,000 downward revisions to U.S. payrolls — the largest since 2009. Is it signaling recession?
summary: There's a lot of debate about how much signal to take from the 818,000 downward revisions to U.S. payrolls — the largest since 2009. Is it signaling recession?

title: India walks a diplomatic tightrope, making friends with Ukraine while ally Russia watches on

title: China calls EU tariffs on EVs unfair, says it will take necessary measures to defend industry

title: EV company Nio aims to build battery chargers and swap stations in every Chinese county

title: The world's largest steel industry is going through a 'winter' amid a supply glut and weak demand
